member.name: IDWriteRemoteFontFileLoader.CreateFontFileReferenceFromUrl
member.summary: Creates a font file reference from a URL if the loader supports this capability.
member.param: Factory used to create the font file reference.
Optional base URL. The base URL is used to resolve the fontFileUrl if it is relative. For example, the baseUrl might be the URL of the referring document that contained the fontFileUrl.
Receives a pointer to the newly created font file reference.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: IDWriteRemoteFontFileLoader.CreateRemoteStreamFromKey
member.summary: Creates a remote font file stream object that encapsulates an open file resource and can be used to download remote file data.
member.param: Font file reference key that uniquely identifies the font file resource within the scope of the font loader being used.
Size of font file reference key in bytes.
Pointer to the newly created font file stream.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: IDWriteRemoteFontFileLoader.GetLocalityFromKey
member.summary: Gets the locality of the file resource identified by the unique key.
member.param: Font file reference key that uniquely identifies the font file resource within the scope of the font loader being used.
Size of font file reference key in bytes.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: IDWriteRemoteFontFileLoader
member.summary: Represents a font file loader that can access remote (i.e., downloadable) fonts. The method returns an instance of this interface, which the client can use to load remote fonts without having to implement a custom loader. A client can also create its own custom implementation, however. In either case, the client is responsible for registering and unregistering the loader using IDWriteFactory.and IDWriteFactory..
